about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Andrii Pavliuk, full-stack software engineer from Kyiv, Ukraine. I make the web a more interactive and exciting place by creating applications for the modern üåç world. I love working with the latest technologies to build modular and testable projects.

items.description: Dedicated and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with 5 years of experience creating and implementing innovative web designs and user experiences. Proficient in HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and modern frontend frameworks. Adept at collaborating with clients and cross-functional teams to drive project success. Passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.

Results-driven Backend Developer with 10 years of experience designing, implementing, testing, and maintaining server-side applications and databases. Proficient in multiple programming languages, databases, and backend frameworks. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and efficient solutions. Passionate about solving complex technical challenges and staying current with emerging technologies.
